meanings.definition: To move on skis over snow.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I skied down the mountain.
meanings.sent2: During winter, many people skied in the Alps.
meanings.sent3: The penguin skied gracefully on the icy slope.
meanings.sent4: Her words skied through the room, leaving a trail of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The child skied with such joy that it was contagious.

meanings.definition: To travel or participate in skiing.
meanings.sent1: We skied to the ski resort for our vacation.
meanings.sent2: They skied across the country to compete in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The family skied to the grocery store on their skis.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts skied to the upcoming ski trip, distracting him from work.
meanings.sent5: The team skied together, enjoying the snowy landscape.
